channel.title: Get the xp for 5*Amountofess
channel.description:
Normally, in my runecrafting im making now ive made it so you get 5*YourRCingLevel XP but i figured, you could take 1 ess at a time and get the same xp as 25 ess so...
How would you make it that you get 5*AmountOfEssInInvent XP instead?
Thanks, Ryan.
